name: Dawn of Survival
description:
On this island, the player’s primary objective is to survive, collect all the keys required to activate the drawbridge and escape the island. There are a lot of hostile creatures that will try to stop the character from escaping the island! The player will need to gather all the collectible keys in order to activate the drawbridge to a boat and escape the island.

Find your own way to play the game. 

Players can go absolutely gung - ho and kill every hostile creature and collect all coins to set up a high score or can speedrun it to the end.

Always have a eye on your health (you don’t want it dropping down to 0), survive till you made it out of the island
